pages.title: Alexandrite Paxel
pages.text: The Alexandrite Paxel is a unique item, it combines the mining power of an Axe, Shovel and a Pickaxe all into one Tool, It is also the fastest tool in Elegant Expansions. Once you have an Alexandrite Paxel you can use it to mine Alexandrite Ores which are located in the same region as Diamonds.$(br2)Alexandrite Ore can only be Mined with Alexandrite tools, You can then use Alexandrite to craft its respective Tools, Weapons and Armour. The 2nd strongest tier in Elegant Expansions.

pages.title: Paxel Crafting Recipe
pages.text: This is the only way to craft the Alexandrite Paxel. To Craft other Alexandrite gear follow the same crafting Recipes of Diamond Weapons/Tools/Armour but use Alexandrite instead.
